content.rendered:
Source: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/stopproxy-protect-your-server-from-proxies-bots.19653/

Video:

Commands:

/sproxy help: List of available commands
/sproxy reload: Reload plugin
/sproxy protection [ON/OFF]: Enable or Disable protection
/sproxy maintenance [ON/OFF]: Enable or Disable maintenance
/sproxy autoban [ON/OFF]: Enable or Disable autoban
/sproxy notify [ON/OFF]: Enable or Disable notifications
/sproxy apimode [ON/OFF]: Change API MODE
/sproxy welcomemsg [ON/OFF]: Enable or Disable welcome message.
/sproxy getconfig: Get StopProxy Config
/sproxy hidejoin [ON/OFF] – Enable or Disable join and left messages.

Permissions:

stopproxy.admin – assigned to OP by default, allows the player to use /sproxy.
stopproxy.maintenance.bypass- assigned to OP by default, this allows the player to bypass the Maintenance.
stopproxy.nocheck – assigned to OP by default, this will grant immunity to the player.

Is IMPORTANT reset the config file each update.

Terms of Service

You are not permitted to decompile or modify the plugin in any form.
We reserve the right to change these Terms at any time, and you agree to abide by the most recent version of this.
